name: My Pet Dentist Clinic - Free Fun Animal Games
name_original: My Pet Dentist Clinic - Free Fun Animal Games
description:
Get ready to play the most Amazing Animal Dentist Doctor game for you, play this animal doctor game, kill all those germs, get High points so your animals feel happy.

Look at your TIGER, CAT, MONKEY and DORA all are waiting for you, please come play, shine their teeth, help them to get rid of their pain, KILL all those GERMS, Get highest score,

Such fun game for Boys and Girls, Everybody would love and enjoy to become dentist for their little cute animals as it has ton of fun tools to clean, shine, kill germs in Awesome animal dentist clinic.

AMAZING FEATURES:
*CRAZY Tools to get rid of cavities!
* Awesome fun sounds.
* Tooth Decay! Yank those ugly teeth!
* Bad Breath! Pew! Spray away the bad breath!
* Shine up their teeth with a toothbrush!
* Add some sparkling GRILLZ!
* Fun trinkets for their braces!
* Mini FUN GAMES inside!

DOWNLOAD TODAY and take care of your little buddies!!

Please rate our game with your valuable feedback, we would love to hear from you!!

Thanks.
